alert.note: Alert for DeSoto; Tate; Tunica (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 12 at 6:56AM CST until January 12 at 7:45AM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Lee County in eastern Arkansas... Eastern St. Francis County in eastern Arkansas... Crittenden County in eastern Arkansas... DeSoto County in northwestern Mississippi... Tunica County in northwestern Mississippi... Tate County in northwestern Mississippi... Shelby County in west Tennessee... * Until 745 AM CST. * At 656 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Jennette to near Helena-West Helena, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Bartlett, Southaven, Germantown, Olive Branch, West Memphis, Horn Lake, Hernando, Marion, Millington, Senatobia, Hughes, T O Fuller State Park, Cordova, Memphis, Lakeland, Arlington, Coldwater, Walls, Tunica, and Crawfordsville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 AM CST for eastern Arkansas...northwestern Mississippi...and west Tennessee.
